name: ClawMem Integration
description: Integrate ClawMem REST API for automatic conversation storage and recall. Zero dependencies, uses existing ClawMem service.

baseUrl.description: ClawMem API base URL (e.g., https://clawmem.example.com/api/v1 or http://localhost:8090/api/v1)

defaultUser.description: User ID to use for memory storage/recall

memoryLimit.description: Number of memories to recall per conversation

maxMessageChars.description: Truncate each message to this length before storage

agentIds.description: Only activate for these agent IDs. Empty means all agents.
